column1: It was a beautiful Friday morning in @entity1. The sun was shining and the birds were singing their song. @entity0 woke up and got dressed. She had plans to go to the beach and look out on the ocean today. @entity0 had some chores to do first. She needed to clean and organize. @entity0 started by cleaning the bathroom. She then cleaned the living room, dining room, kitchen and her bedroom. After cleaning the bedroom, she organized her books on her desk. She then organized her spices in the kitchen. @entity0 started to make lunch. @entity0 had a choice between pizza, sandwiches and salad. She wanted to have pizza today. She chose to make a salad for lunch tomorrow and Sunday. @entity0 went to the store to buy lettuce. She went home after buying lettuce and ate pizza. After that, she took a walk and enjoyed the clear blue sky and breeze. She ended up walking to the beach.
@placeholder day was @entity0 making salad for lunch
